Reviews.Title: Tablet where you can actually do productive stuff
Reviews.Author: D.S.
Reviews.Content: You don't have to worry about your tablet die because of poor battery performance anymore. Just get this tablet fully charged when you take it to a coffee shop and you are good for 7 to 8 hours even if you are watching videos intermittently. The fact that this is windows 8 tablet, you can be productive where ever you are - use word, excel, do programming, install software etc.,stuff you can't do with Android or iOS based tablets. In short, if you are looking for a tablet where you would like to do what you do at work, then I believe this tablet will not disappoint you. Just a word of caution - avoid using this tablet for long hours as it may strain your eyes since the size of the screen is small compared to your desktop computers.

Reviews.Title: Impressive Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bargain Outlet"
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet. It performs well for all Apps from the Windows store.  It easily upgraded to Windows 8.1.  I love the keyboard docking station.  The dock station provides a few different angles to use it as a stand.  Overall a great alternative to Android tablets.

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 8 32-bit, 10.1 inch Display
Intel Atom Dual-Core Processor Z2760 - 1.5GHz (1MB Cache)
32 GB Flash Memory, 2 GB RAM Memory
9-hour battery life, 1.27 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Iconia W510-1438 10.1-inch 32GB Tablet with Keyboard Dock (Silver)
